Yes - I assumed parts of the "All Methods Public"
thread in here.

To summarize: 
By putting methods on a Helper and making them public
I'm simulating being able to turn off
private/protected checking on methods in the JVM, so
that all methods can be easily tested and receive the
benefits of test driven development, while keeping the
tests tightly linked to the methods they are testing. 


Cheers,
- Ole
